name: Nymb Collection
description:
Time is your greatest resource. Your currency. Your life.

Learn to value every second — and gain even more.
Nymb is a space where time becomes a true asset, not just a fleeting moment.
Here, we do not forgive those who waste it — and we reward those who master it.

The Nymb NFT unlocks a path to hidden opportunities: privileges, bonuses, and exclusive advantages available only to the few who truly understand the value of their time.
It’s your personal gateway to a world where time works for you.

Time runs out for everyone. But not for you.
